entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as someone who is goggling at the girl and seems to have become temporarily speechless. He is also mentioned as saying 'She's a veela!' and 'I'm telling you, that's not a normal girl!'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who starts to laugh at Ron's reaction. He is also mentioned as being the one Harry says 'She's a veela!' to.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as someone who corrects Ron and says 'Of course she isn't!'.

entities.name: the girl
entities.description: The girl is described as a veela, with many boys' heads turning to look at her. She is also mentioned as being carried off to the Ravenclaw table by another person.

entities.name: the ravenclaw table
entities.description: The Ravenclaw table is described as a location where the girl is carried off to.

relationships.description: Ron is gazing at the girl, and seems to have become temporarily speechless. This relationship is described as Ron's reaction to seeing the girl.
Ron is talking to Harry, and says 'She's a veela!' and 'I'm telling you, that's not a normal girl!'. This relationship is described as Ron's conversation with Harry.
Hermione corrects Ron and says 'Of course she isn't!'. This relationship is described as Hermione's correction of Ron.
The girl attracts the attention of many boys, with their heads turning to look at her. This relationship is described as the reaction of the boys to seeing the girl.
